title: N. Korea says it's investigating Travis King in 1st response to UN messages
description: North Korea for the first time responded to messages regarding a U.S. soldier who ran across the demilitarized zone two weeks ago, according to defense officials.

title: Fitch downgrades US credit rating, citing mounting debt and political divisions
description: Fitch Ratings has downgraded the U.S. credit rating, citing an expected increase in government debt over the next three years and a “steady deterioration in standards of governance” over the past two decades

title: New lawsuits allege sexual hazing in Northwestern University football program
description: In two new lawsuits filed against Northwestern University, former football players allege they were subjected to demeaning and tortuous hazing as freshmen.

title: What are the latest federal charges against Donald Trump
description: A new federal indictment laid out the details of the former president's alleged conspiracy to overturn the 2020 election.

title: Trump indicted on charges related to efforts to overturn 2020 election
description: Former President Trump has been indicted on charges related to special counsel Jack Smith's probe into efforts to overturn the 2020 election, sources tell ABC News.

title: DOJ unseals new Jan. 6 arrest
description: The Department of Justice unsealed a new Jan. 6 arrest on Tuesday as former President Donald Trump is the target of an investigation into the events surrounding Jan. 6.

title: Potential witness in alleged Missouri kidnapping, rape case found dead
description: Timothy M. Haslett Jr. has been indicted by grand jury on kidnapping, rape charges in Missouri.

title: Trump allies charged with felonies involving voting machines
description: Matthew DePerno, a former candidate for attorney general in Michigan pleaded not guilty on Tuesday.

title: Toddler dies after grandmother leaves her in hot car for 8 hours
description: Police say a 14-month-old girl died after her grandmother left her unattended in a hot car in New York for eight hours

title: Transgender rights targeted in executive order signed by Oklahoma governor
description: Gov. Kevin Stitt has signed an executive order targeting transgender rights in Oklahoma

title: Students' lives thrown into disarray after W.Va. college announces plans to close
description: The lives of hundreds of students at a small university in West Virginia have been turned upside down after the school announced just before the start of fall classes that it plans to cease operations

title: Teen cyclist from Team USA fatally struck days before world championships
description: An up-and-coming American cyclist who was a member of the U.S. National Team was struck and killed by a car while he was training for a race over the weekend.

title: WATCH:  Clingy dog competes with newborn baby for owner's attention
description: This dramatic boxer is doing the most in hopes of getting a belly rub.

title: WATCH:  Little girl gives herself pep talk to jump into water
description: "I'm not even afraid anymore!"

title: Fate of American nurse and child reportedly kidnapped in Haiti still unknown
description: The efforts to locate Alix Dorsainvil and her child continued Tuesday -- five days after they were reportedly kidnapped.

title: 'Narrow opportunity' to restore democracy in Niger after attempted coup: Official
description: The United States assess that there is only a "narrow opportunity" to restore democratic order in Niger, a senior official told ABC News.

title: Mega Millions jackpot soars above $1 billion ahead of Tuesday night's drawing
description: The estimated Mega Millions jackpot is $1.1 billion, which would be the fourth-largest jackpot in the lottery game's history.

title: CVS to lay off 5,000 employees in push to shed costs
description: The layoffs at CVS will affect "non-customer facing positions," the company said.

title: NJ lieutenant governor dies unexpectedly from undisclosed medical issue
description: New Jersey Lt. Gov. Sheila Oliver died Tuesday, one day after she was rushed to the hospital for an undisclosed medical issue.

title: 3 men died of blunt force injuries, asphyxiation in Iowa building collapse
description: Iowa's health agency says three men killed in a downtown Davenport apartment building collapse more than two months ago died of blunt-force injuries and asphyxiation

title: Tiger Woods joins PGA Tour board and throws support behind Commissioner Jay Monahan
description: Tiger Woods has joined the PGA Tour policy board for the first time in his 27 years on tour

title: Body of hiker missing for 37 years discovered in melting glacier
description: The body of a hiker who has been missing for 37 years has been unearthed on a thawing glacier near the Matterhorn in the Swiss Alps.

title: State investigators called in after Memphis police thwart 'potential mass shooting'
description: The Tennessee Bureau of Investigation announced that it has launched a probe into the incident at the request of Shelby County District Attorney Steve Mulroy.

title: Firefighters contain a quarter of massive California-Nevada wildfire
description: Firefighters have managed to partially contain a massive wildfire after the blaze started in a California wildland preserve and spread into Nevada, its smoke blotting out the sun on the Las Vegas Strip while flames scorched tens of thousands of acres o...

title: Bond denied for woman accused of killing newlywed bride in drunken crash
description: The South Carolina woman accused of killing a newlywed bride when she drunkenly slammed her car into a golf cart is not getting released from jail before her trial

title: No known link between Gilgo Beach murder suspect, Atlantic City slayings: Prosecutor
description: There's no apparent connection between Gilgo Beach murder suspect Rex Heuermann and the 2006 deaths of sex workers near Atlantic City, New Jersey.

title: Pulled out to sea by current, swimmer rescued after treading water for 5 hours
description: Police say a swimmer who got swept out to sea by a powerful current was rescued off New York’s Long Island after treading water for five hours

title: Job openings fall to lowest level in 2 years as demand for workers cools
description: U.S. employers posted fewer jobs in June, a sign that the red-hot demand for workers that has been a key feature of the post-pandemic economy is cooling a bit

title: Overstock officially launches Bed Bath & Beyond domain online in US
description: Overstock has officially relaunched the Bed & Bath & Beyond site online Tuesday in the U.S., after acquiring the bankrupt retail chain’s intellectual property assets for $21.5 million

title: Dutch ministry: Fire that blazed for nearly week on cargo ship appears to be out
description: The Dutch government says a fire that had been burning on board a cargo ship carrying thousands of new cars appears to have burnt itself out after nearly a week

title: US opens safety probe into complaints from Tesla drivers over steering control loss
description: U.S. auto safety regulators have opened another investigation into safety problems with Tesla vehicles

title: WATCH:  World War II veteran carries 100 pounds for his 97th birthday
description: David Keaggy jumped out of an airplane for his 70th birthday. He bench pressed 225 pounds for his 82nd birthday, and did 83 straight pushups when he turned 90.

title: US slips into round of 16 of Women's World Cup after scoreless draw with Portugal
description: The two-time reigning champion United States came an inch short of Women’s World Cup elimination, but Portugal’s late near-miss helped the Americans avoid the biggest upset in tournament history

title: Russia accuses Ukraine of drone attack on Moscow, hitting a tower for the second time
description: Russian authorities early Tuesday accused Kyiv of yet another attack on Moscow and its surroundings with drones, one of which hit a building in the capital that was damaged by a drone just days ago in a similar attack early Sunday

title: Police officer shot and wounded; suspect also hit in Los Angeles suburb of Whittier
description: Authorities say a police officer has been shot and the suspected gunman wounded in the Los Angeles suburb of Whittier

title: 11 dead and 27 missing in flooding around Beijing after days of rain
description: Chinese state media report 11 people have died and 27 are missing amid flooding in the mountains surrounding the capital Beijing

title: Fate of American nurse and daughter kidnapped by armed men in Haiti remains uncertain
description: The fate of an American nurse and her daughter kidnapped in Haiti last week remains unknown as the State Department refused to say whether the abductors made demands

title: Police arrest, charge suspect for allegedly hitting 6 migrants with SUV
description: Police in Lincolnton, North Carolina, arrested a man on felony hit and run Monday.

title: Wife of Gilgo Beach murder suspect: ‘Everything is destroyed' after husband's arrest
description: The wife of Rex Heuermann told ABC News Monday that "everything is destroyed" following the arrest of her husband.

title: Brightly flashing 'X' sign removed from the San Francisco building that was Twitter's headquarters
description: A brightly flashing “X” sign has been removed from the San Francisco headquarters of the company formerly known as Twitter just days after it was installed
